description: This file implements an in-memory data source for a fleet management system, providing sample data and methods to interact with vehicles, groups, and maintenance events. It is designed for testing or development purposes and will be replaced by a persistent storage solution later.

classes.name: MemoryDataSource
classes.description: An in-memory implementation of the DataSource interface, providing sample data for vehicles, groups, and events, suitable for testing or development purposes.

methods.name: _initializeSampleData
methods.description: Populates the in-memory lists with sample data for groups, vehicles, and maintenance events.

methods.name: getVehicles
methods.description: Returns a list of all vehicles.

methods.name: getVehicle
methods.description: Retrieves a vehicle by its ID.

methods.name: addVehicle
methods.description: Adds a new vehicle to the list.

methods.name: deleteVehicle
methods.description: Removes a vehicle by its ID.

methods.name: getGroups
methods.description: Returns a list of all business groups.

methods.name: getGroup
methods.description: Retrieves a business group by its ID.

methods.name: getEvents
methods.description: Returns a list of all maintenance events.

methods.name: getEvent
methods.description: Retrieves a maintenance event by ID.

methods.name: getEventsByVehicle
methods.description: Returns all events associated with a specific vehicle.
